mapper.select: SELECT m.*, p.* FROM wadiz_member m LEFT JOIN wadiz_member_profile p ON m.ID = p.ID WHERE m.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: update wadiz_member set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone} where id=#{id}
update wadiz_member_profile set profile_name=#{profile_name}, profile_size=#{profile_size}, profile_url=#{profile_url} where id=#{id}
